oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fight For a Shorter Work Week
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Average Work Day
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: People holding flyers regard a ten hour day. Second Panel: Children working at a machine. Third Panel: Man speaking to a crowd. Fourth Panel: Picket for an eight hour day.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
